about_the_game:
The Book of Outcasts is a sequel to TKS: Conussia and The Book of Bondmaids, taking place 100 years after the events of those games.

The icy lands of Conussia have not changed much in the last hundred years – the winters are still biting and cold, the people still stoic and proud and the lands still beautiful and haunting, but the scars left after the Lich King overthrew the Romanzak royal family all those years ago remain.

A disgraced former soldier, you are recruited into the Tsarina’s secretive Sparrows to investigate and hunt down the rogue mage Carpenter, taking a position as a Constable in a remote village far from civilisation but built on the ruins of an ancient and terrible city. Quickly, however, you become embroiled in the workings of the mysterious order of undying wizards known as the Outcasts.


The Book of Outcasts is an RPG dungeon crawler, horror and management sim where you play as either a male or female character, travelling through icy forests and sweltering hot jungles tracking down the mysterious mage in the wooden mask, who may hold the secrets of your own past.

Your character will need to gain allies and equipment if they are to survive, as well as ensure the village will survive the winter. The snows are bitterly cold in Kemskaya Volost, but the fires and the beds are warm…

(The Book of Outcasts is strictly 18+ due to mature themes and extremely strong sexual content, including depiction of consensual acts, BDSM, gay/ lesbian sex, graphic descriptions of torture, use of drugs and alcohol, group sex, murder, strong language and swearing, full male and female nudity, and prostitution).
